text:
Hey guys I'm having trouble with a child theme not overwriting the parent. I am trying to make the majority of the modules in the parent theme unavailable in the child.

To do that I copied my modules folder and went through the module's meta.json files and set
`"is_available_for_new_content": false`
but whenever I create a new page and add content, the modules are still available to the editor.

The "Make available in templates and pages" is also turned off.

Has anyone experienced this or know what I might be doing wrong?
